name: User Forgot Password
subject: Update your {%global.companyName%} helpdesk password
message:
{%global.companyLogo%}


Hi {%user.userName%},


You recently requested to reset your password for your {%global.companyName%} account. Click the link to reset it {%user.forgotPasswordLink%}


If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this mail or revert back to let us know.


Thanks and Regards

{%global.companyName%}

name: Agent Reply To The Customer's ticket
subject: New Reply Added on ticket #{% ticket.id %}
message:
{%global.companyLogo%}


New Response!!


Hello {%ticket.customerName%},


A reply has been added by the {%ticket.agentName%} on your ticket {%ticket.id%}. Kindly follow this link {%ticket.customerLink%} to get the insight of the message.  


Here go the ticket message:

{%ticket.threadMessage%}{%ticket.attachments%}


Thanks and Regards

{%global.companyName%}

name: Ticket generated by customer
subject: A new ticket #{%ticket.id%} has been generated by {%ticket.customerName%}
message:
{%global.companyLogo%}


Ticket generated!!


Hello {%ticket.agentName%},


A new ticket {%ticket.id%} has been generated by {%ticket.customerName%} from the id {%ticket.customerEmail%}. Hit on the link provided so that you can have the access to the ticket {%ticket.agentLink%}.


Here goes the ticket message:

{%ticket.threadMessage%} {%ticket.attachments%}



Thanks and Regards

{%global.companyName%}

name: Agent Account Created
subject: Welcome to {%global.companyName%} Helpdesk Support System
message:
{%global.companyLogo%}

Thank you for joining!!


Hello {%user.userName%},


Your account has been successfully created.


Click on the link to set your password {%user.accountValidationLink%}  and get started with the {%global.companyName%}  services.


Thanks and Regards

{%global.companyName%}

name: Ticket Assign
subject: Ticket #{% ticket.id %} assign to you
message:
{%global.companyLogo%}


Ticket assigned- Get ready!!


Hello {%ticket.agentName%},

A ticket {%ticket.id%} has been assigned to you. You are requested to follow this link {%ticket.agentLink%} to get the access of the ticket.


Here go the ticket message:

{%ticket.message%}


Thanks and Regards

{%global.companyName%}

name: Customer Reply To The Agent
subject: Customer Reply Ticket #{% ticket.id %}
message:
{%global.companyLogo%}


New Response!!


Hello {%ticket.agentName%},


New reply have been added to ticket #{%ticket.id%} you can login to ticket system through this link {%ticket.agentLink%}.

 

Customer reply:
{%ticket.threadMessage%}{%ticket.attachments%}


Thanks and Regards

{%global.companyName%}

name: Ticket generated success mail to customer
subject: New ticket #{% ticket.id %} Received
message:
{%global.companyLogo%}


Ticket generated!!



Hello {%ticket.customerName%},


Thank you so much for taking the time to connect us!


Your ticket #{%ticket.id%} has been received. You can check ticket through this link {%ticket.customerLink%} and you can also reply via this email.


Our support staff will get back to you shortly (it might take a bit longer on evenings and weekends). Feel free to ask for any support request we will be happy to help.

Here go the ticket message:

{%ticket.threadMessage%} {%ticket.attachments%}


Thanks and Regards

{%global.companyName%}

name: Customer Account Created
subject: Welcome to {%global.companyName%} Helpdesk
message:
{%global.companyLogo%}


Thank you for joining!!


Hello {%user.userName%},


Your account has been successfully created. We welcome you to the community of {%global.companyName%}.


It is our privilege to have you as our customer. We are pretty much sure that you will love the fact that how simple it is to get started with the services. We are dedicated to making your working life simpler.


Click on the link to set your password {%user.accountValidationLink%}  and get started with the {%global.companyName%}  services.


Hoping that you will enjoy this experience.


Thanks and Regards

{%global.companyName%}

name: Collaborator added to ticket
subject: A new Collaborator have been added
message:
{%global.companyLogo%}

 

Thank you for joining!!


Hello {%ticket.collaboratorName%},

 

 

Collaborator of the ticket #{%ticket.id%} has added a reply. You can check the ticket from here {%ticket.customerLink%}

 

Here go the message:

{%ticket.threadMessage%}

 

Thanks and Regards

{%global.companyName%}
